properties.Name: ResponsibilityCenter
properties.Description:
A responsibility center is a department or organizational unit that is assigned responsibility of costs, expenses, revenues, profit and/or investments.

The responsibility center id is quite often incorporated into the Ledger Account Number.

Columns.Name: ResponsibilityCenterId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Responsibility Center.

Columns.Name: ResponsibilityCenterDescription
Columns.Description: A description of the responsibility center.

Columns.Name: ResponsibilityCenterNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the responsibility center.

Columns.Name: OrganizationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an organization.

Columns.Name: ResponsibilityCenterTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Responsibility Center Type.
